entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
